headline: A Look At Willis Towers Watson (WTW) Valuation After VM-22 RiskAgility FM Upgrade Announcement
summary: Willis Towers Watson (WTW) is in focus after announcing next generation U.S. Library models within its RiskAgility FM platform, fully incorporating new VM-22 reserving requirements for non variable annuity products used by insurers and reinsurers. See our latest analysis for Willis Towers Watson. The latest VM-22 product update lands after a sharp swing in sentiment, with a 7 day share price return of a 17.56% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of an 11.2% decline, although 3 and 5...
